meanings.definition: A person lower in rank, status, or quality than others.
meanings.sent1: The king looked down on his inferiors with disdain.
meanings.sent2: She always treated her inferiors with kindness and respect.
meanings.sent3: The cat considered the mouse as its inferior plaything.
meanings.sent4: In the world of chess, the pawn is often seen as the inferior piece.
meanings.sent5: The teacher made sure to encourage the shy student, who felt like an inferior in the classroom.

meanings.definition: Of lower rank, status, or quality than others.
meanings.sent1: The inferior quality of the product was evident from the start.
meanings.sent2: He felt inferior to his classmates who excelled in sports.
meanings.sent3: The inferior paint job on the car made it stand out in a bad way.
meanings.sent4: Her inferior skills in math held her back from pursuing a career in finance.
meanings.sent5: The inferior material used in the construction caused the building to collapse easily.
